title: Pet population in Europe 2018 , by animal type
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of pets in thousands for 6 number of Pet Types.
The Number of pets in thousands is appeared to be the highest at Pet Type Cat and lowest at Pet Type Reptiles.
There is a difference of 95980.0 between the maximum Pet Type Cat and minimum Pet Type Reptiles.
min_summary: This bar chart has 6 columns on the x axis representing Pet Type, and Number of pets in thousands in each Pet Type on the y axis.
The Number of pets in thousands is appeared to be the highest at Pet Type Cat and lowest at Pet Type Reptiles.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of pets in thousands for 6 number of Pet Types.
The Number of pets in thousands is appeared to be the highest at Pet Type Cat and lowest at Pet Type Reptiles.
There is a difference of 95980.0 between the maximum Pet Type Cat and minimum Pet Type Reptiles.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Pet Type in the x axis and Number of pets in thousands in the y axis.
Pet Type Cat has the highest Number of pets in thousands and Reptiles has the lowest Number of pets in thousands.
Second maximum Number of pets in thousands is found at Pet Type Dog.
The highest Pet Type Cat has 95980.0 more Number of pets in thousands than the lowest Pet Type Reptiles.
Number of pets in thousands at Pet Type Cat is 103828.0 , second place is Dog at 85184.0, and thirdly is Ornamental bird at 50212.0.
Considered together, the average Number of pets in thousands in all 6 Pet Types is roughly 48226.5.
The Number of pets in thousands is 289359.0 if we add up values of all Pet Types.
